original_text: Cornelius was a good man. He and all his family served God faithfully. Cornelius prayed to God every day. He also gave money to help poor Jewish people.
korean_text: 그가 경건하여 온 집안과 더불어 하나님을 경외하며 백성을 많이 구제하고 하나님께 항상 기도하더니

sentences.original_text: He and all his family served God faithfully
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 모든 가족은 충성스럽게 하나님을 섬겼습니다

sentences.original_text: Cornelius prayed to God every day
He also gave money to help poor Jewish people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 가난한 유대인들을 돕기 위해 돈을 주었습니다
